results.title: Kexing Biopharm's Human Umbilical Cord Mesenchymal Stem Cell-Derived Exosomes Registered with FDA DMF
results.description: SHENZHEN, China, Sept. 17, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Kexing Biopharm announced that its investigational Human Umbilical Cord Mesenchymal Stem Cell-Derived Exosomes has successfully completed a Type II Drug Master File (DMF) registration with the U.S. FDA. Exosomes, as a next-generation bioactive carrier, boast unique advantages such as low immunogenicity, strong tissue penetration, and potential for targeted modification, offering immense promise for medical applications. However, the technical barriers and research challenges in Exosome development place them at the forefront of complexity among bioactive material fields. This achievement builds on Kexing's K'Exosome platform, which is built on high-performance GMP-grade exosome "end-to-end" production technology. The platform's core strengths lie in its "six highs and one low" advantages: high purity, high yield, high efficiency, high recovery rate, high stability, high bioactivity, and low cost. This enables scalable, standardized, and intelligent manufacturing of clinical-grade exosomes. Additionally, the platform offers advanced engineering capabilities for efficient protein/small nucleic acid loading and precise targeted modification, providing a comprehensive solution from molecular design to process scale-up for next-generation delivery therapies. Kexing Biopharm will continue to advance its "Innovation + Internationalization" strategy, driving the global development and application of exosome technologies and delivering high-quality solutions for broader healthcare needs.

results.title: realme 15 Series Offers Next-level 3-in-1 Imaging Revolution; Pre-order Starts 18 September
results.description: KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia, Sept. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Why settle for one way to capture life's moments when you can have three? Dubbed the segment's best imaging smartphone, the realme 15 Series boasts a revolutionary camera system built on a 3-in-1 concept that combines professional-grade photography, cinematic video recording, and dynamic live photos in one sleek smartphone. This AI Party Phone will be available for pre-order starting 18 September, and early-bird customers will be receiving free gifts worth up to RM1,346. realme 15 Series Offers Next-level 3-in-1 Imaging Revolution; Pre-order Starts 18 September From 18 September to 27 September, interested customers can place orders at realme Brand Stores nearest to them with a deposit of RM20. Free gifts include realme Buds T200 Lite, realme ice tumbler, RM100 rebate, 1-year extended warranty and 1-year screen crack warranty. Party-ready with Triple 50MP Camera The realme 15 Pro features a triple 50MP ultra-clear system. A Sony IMX896 main sensor delivers crisp detail and vivid color, the 50MP ultra-wide captures expansive scenes, and the 50MP front camera elevates selfies—making everything from nightscapes to spontaneous street shots effortless. realme 15 Series introduces AI Party Mode. This innovative feature taps on an optimised algorithm to capture bright, vivid portraits under challenging lighting conditions. Together with exclusive lighting effects and creative watermarks, the AI Party Mode empowers young users to revive the party atmosphere through every shot. Segment's Best 4K60fps Video Recording Content creators get unrivalled video quality with realme 15 Pro's 4K60fps recording across all three lenses – main, ultra-wide and front. Be it vlogging at a buzzing concert, filming cinematic travel adventures, or capturing smooth action shots, the AI Party Phone delivers professional-grade footage from any angle. Making its debut on the realme 15 Pro, the 2K Live Photo reimagines how we capture memories. By blending the intimacy of a photo with the emotion of video, it preserves fleeting details—like a friend's laugh or a passing breeze—in crisp 2K clarity, creating living images that feel vibrant and personal. The realme 15 Pro redefines smartphone creativity with its 3-in-1 camera system: a Triple 50MP camera for stunning photos, 4K60fps recording across all three lenses for cinematic video, and an industry-leading 2K Live Photo that turns snapshots into living memories. Join the realme 15 Series launch livestream on 18 September 2025, and follow realme on Facebook, TikTok, and YouTube for more information. -Ends- About realme: realme is a global consumer technology company disrupting the smartphone market by making cutting-edge technologies more accessible. It provides a range of smartphones and lifestyle technology devices with premium specs, quality, and trend-setting designs to young consumers. Established by Sky Li in 2018, realme has become one of the top five smartphone players in 30 markets globally in just three years, and realme has entered multiple markets worldwide, including China and Southeast Asia, South Asia, Europe, the Middle East, Latin America, and Africa, and has a global user base of over 200 million. 2024 is the year of rebranding for realme with its new slogan, "Make it real." Under the new brand spirit, realme will focus more on young users than before and bring real, clear, and tangible benefits to their lives. For more information, please visit https://www.realme.com/my/.
